violations.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming

nodes.html: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, maximum-scale=1, minimum-scale=1, user-scalable=0">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  user-scalable on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
